name: Quack (Prototype/Demo)
description:
CONTROLS:
  • X to jump
  • C to grab/drop
  • Arrow keys to move/aim/duck
  • R to reset player
SUMMARY:

Collect the three fruit hidden across the level and bring them to the podiums. When holding a fruit, you can't jump, so some juggling and cloud moving is in order!

This is my first-game jam AND first "completed" game- what an experience! The game changed pretty drastically from my initial scope. There are so many things I wish to have added that I either didn't have enough time for or kept breaking the game, like item outlines, more fruit, and rain clouds, so this exists as a proof of concept for right now!

(If you encounter a softlock, hold W and press R to reset the clouds and fruit to their original posiitions.)
